articles.author: Shaun Powell
articles.title: Thunder-Pacers: 5 takeaways as Jalen Williams carries OKC to brink of 1st championship - NBA
articles.description: Jalen Williams scores 40 points and Shai Gilgeous-Alexander adds 31 as OKC staves off yet another Indiana comeback.
articles.content:
Jalen Williams erupts for a playoff career-high 40 points as the Thunder take a 3-2 lead in the NBA Finals.
OKLAHOMA CITY — Its unusual for the flavor of one game to seep into the next, as these con… [+9072 chars]
